rules_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
Once each turn, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from the top of your library.
{1}{R}: Transform Paranormal Convergence. Activate only if the total number of instant and/or sorcery cards you own in exile and
in your graveyard is five or more.
rules_text2:
Flying
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast instant and sorcery spells from the top of your library.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Parabolic Predator deals 1 damage to any target.
